docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration is updating its advice for pregnant women on the appropriate levels of mercury in seafood. Commissioner Margaret Hamburg says the agency won't require mercury labels on seafood packages.

headline.main: FDA Taking Another Look at Mercury in Seafood
headline.print_headline: FDA Taking Another Look at Mercury in Seafood

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration is updating its advice for pregnant women on the appropriate levels of mercury in seafood. Commissioner Margaret Hamburg says the agency won't require mercury labels on seafood packages.

docs.lead_paragraph: The new treatment would be a less invasive way to safeguard a woman’s chances of having babies than the current method.

headline.main: Drug Saves Fertility for Women With Cancer
headline.print_headline: Drug Saves Fertility for Women With Cancer

docs.abstract: Researchers find commonly used drug goserelin can help young women with breast cancer retain ability to have babies; drug was shown in clinical trials to protect ovaries from damage caused by chemotherapy by shutting them down temporarily, preventing more permanent premature menopause that can be induced otherwise.
docs.snippet: The new treatment would be a less invasive way to safeguard a woman’s chances of having babies than the current method.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration is updating its advice for pregnant women on the appropriate levels of mercury in seafood but Commissioner Margaret Hamburg said Friday that it won't require mercury labels on seafood packages.

headline.main: FDA to Update Seafood Guidance for Pregnant Women
headline.print_headline: FDA to Update Seafood Guidance for Pregnant Women

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration is updating its advice for pregnant women on the appropriate levels of mercury in seafood but Commissioner Margaret Hamburg said Friday that it won't require mercury labels on seafood packages.

docs.lead_paragraph: Monaco's ruler Prince Albert and his wife Princess Charlene are expecting their first child, they announced on Friday.

headline.main: Monaco Royals Announce a Baby on the Way
headline.print_headline: Monaco Royals Announce a Baby on the Way

docs.snippet: Monaco's ruler Prince Albert and his wife Princess Charlene are expecting their first child, they announced on Friday.

docs.abstract: A day in the life of armed America.

docs.lead_paragraph: The birth rate among U.S. teens and young women dropped to record lows last year, while the rate among older women hit highs not seen in a half century, according to government statistics released on Thursday.

headline.main: U.S. Birth Rate Hits Lows for Teens, Rises Among Older Women
headline.print_headline: U.S. Birth Rate Hits Lows for Teens, Rises Among Older Women

docs.snippet: The birth rate among U.S. teens and young women dropped to record lows last year, while the rate among older women hit highs not seen in a half century, according to government statistics released on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge told a Milwaukee abortion doctor Thursday to renew his efforts to obtain hospital admitting privileges, hinting that it could resolve a lawsuit alleging a Wisconsin law requiring such privileges is unconstitutional.

headline.main: Judge: Abortion Doctor Must Research Privileges
headline.print_headline: Judge: Abortion Doctor Must Research Privileges

docs.snippet: A federal judge told a Milwaukee abortion doctor Thursday to renew his efforts to obtain hospital admitting privileges, hinting that it could resolve a lawsuit alleging a Wisconsin law requiring such privileges is unconstitutional.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Sudanese woman sentenced to death earlier this month after refusing to renounce her Christian faith has given birth in prison, local newspapers reported Thursday.

headline.main: Sudan Woman on Death Row for Apostasy Gives Birth
headline.print_headline: Sudan Woman on Death Row for Apostasy Gives Birth

docs.snippet: A Sudanese woman sentenced to death earlier this month after refusing to renounce her Christian faith has given birth in prison, local newspapers reported Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Maya Angelou was a woman of many identities — poet foremost among them — but those who knew her well made sure to address her as Dr. Angelou, out of respect for all the honorary degrees she received.

headline.main: Maya Angelou, Writer of Many Talents, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Maya Angelou, Writer of Many Talents, Dies at 86

docs.snippet: Maya Angelou was a woman of many identities — poet foremost among them — but those who knew her well made sure to address her as Dr. Angelou, out of respect for all the honorary degrees she received.
